document.docAuthor: Kathirithamby, Jeyaraney, Mcmahon, Dino P., Anober-Lantican, Gaudencia M. & Ocampo, Virginia R.
document.masterDocTitle: An unusual occurrence of multiparasitism by two genera of Strepsiptera (Insecta) in a mango leafhopper Idioscopus clypealis (Lethierry) (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) in the Philippines
